channel.title: A few questions about editing the graphics on a client
channel.description: 1.Im using an old rsps client. the one with the chalice's on fire and the grey doorway background, how do i get rid of the fire gif's? 2.How do i get rid of the RUNESCAPE logo, i changed my background, now that nasty logo is in the way.

item.title: A few questions about editing the graphics on a client
item.dc:creator: @iHype iHype
item.description:
@iHype wrote:

[quote=“dexter the great, post:1, topic:450475”]1.Im using an old rsps client. the one with the chalice’s on fire and the grey doorway background, how do i get rid of the fire gif’s?
2.How do i get rid of the RUNESCAPE logo, i changed my background, now that nasty logo is in the way.[/quote]

You need tom’s cache suite.
I was working on another client similar to this Client earlier.
open up tom’s cache suite and load the cache.
As for the chalices, i’m reallly not sure.
I’m guessing you’d just search around the cache suite until you find them in the preview display.
They should be .gifs.
Hope this helped.

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions about editing the graphics on a client

item.title: A few questions about editing the graphics on a client
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

check in the cache for a client BG sprite. That should be the background and as for the chalices with fire? No idea.

Read full topic
